import React, { Component } from 'react' export class NewsItem extends Component { render() { let { title, description, urlImage, newsUrl, author, date } = this.props //destructuring return ( <>
{/* one bracket for java script and one for object */}
{title}... 99+ unread messages

{description}....

{author} published on {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

Read More...
) } } export default NewsItem
